snippet.title: Estencel - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2025320?utm_source=youtube.com
Slash your way through Estencel! Traverse across a corrupted, maze like city fighting horrors. Customize and arm yourself into the ultimate monster killing assassin in this fast paced dark fantasy Action RPG. Solve the mysteries of this world before they swallow you whole.

The game has been developed by one person for more than 3 years.
Developer twitter: https://twitter.com/RoneVine

Discord: https://discord.gg/uTpsmFAnjC

Edited by: Chris Lohr (https://twitter.com/TheChrisLohr)
